::Release Notes::


We apologize for the previous Call of duty advanced Warfare Steam-Rip Edition by

SGAMES, the uploader did not pointed out that it was Russian Language only and 

all others who downloaded it were also in shock including us, so now you guys 

have got the English folder so its no worries, why not SEYTER? Russian game at

its best so they only considered the Russian Edition only, Now available on other

public sites if you want it and download the English folder you are easy to go, 

for the size its no cut / no recorded, Multiplayer is untouched and its the full

game in all, so have fun guys and yes have a nice day and stay safe after all :)


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT GOES TO MAXAGENT for Repacking and Distribution.
